prompt:
MealMuse is an intelligent meal planning app that uses AI to generate personalized recipes and weekly plans based on your taste preferences, dietary restrictions, and available ingredients. Whether you're vegan, keto, diabetic, or just trying to eat healthier, MealMuse adapts to your lifestyle in seconds. 

Users begin by selecting their dietary goals, favorite cuisines, disliked ingredients, and how much time they usually have to cook. From there, MealMuse creates a tailored weekly menu, complete with easy-to-follow recipes, portion guidance, and a smart shopping list. The app also supports pantry syncing — input what’s in your kitchen, and it recommends dishes you can cook right now.

Integrated calorie and macro tracking makes it a helpful tool for fitness and health goals. Plus, MealMuse learns with each use — the more you cook and rate meals, the better it gets at predicting what you'll love.

Additional features include integration with grocery delivery services, voice-guided cooking mode, and options for batch cooking or single servings.

MealMuse is not just a recipe app — it’s your AI-powered kitchen companion designed to save time, reduce food waste, and make healthy eating intuitive, personalized, and enjoyable.

umlDiagrams.class:
classDiagram
  class User {
    +id: int
    +name: string
    +email: string
    +setPreferences(dietaryGoals: string, favoriteCuisines: list, dislikedIngredients: list, cookingTime: int): void
    +rateMeal(mealId: int, rating: int): void
  }
  
  class MealPlan {
    +id: int
    +userId: int
    +weeklyMenu: list
    +generateMenu(): void
    +getShoppingList(): list
  }
  
  class Recipe {
    +id: int
    +name: string
    +ingredients: list
    +instructions: string
    +calories: int
    +macros: map
  }
  
  class Pantry {
    +id: int
    +userId: int
    +items: list
    +syncWithPantry(items: list): void
  }
  
  class AIEngine {
    +generateRecipes(preferences: map): list
    +learnFromRatings(userId: int, ratings: map): void
  }
  
  class GroceryService {
    +id: int
    +name: string
    +integrateWithApp(): void
  }
  
  User --> MealPlan
  User --> Pantry
  MealPlan --> Recipe
  Pantry --> Recipe
  User --> AIEngine
  AIEngine --> Recipe
  MealPlan --> GroceryService
umlDiagrams.sequence:
sequenceDiagram
  participant User
  participant MealMuseApp
  participant AIEngine
  participant GroceryService
  participant Pantry

  User->>MealMuseApp: Set Preferences
  MealMuseApp->>AIEngine: Request Recipe Suggestions
  AIEngine-->>MealMuseApp: Return Personalized Recipes
  MealMuseApp->>User: Display Weekly Menu
  User->>MealMuseApp: Rate Meals
  MealMuseApp->>AIEngine: Send Ratings
  User->>Pantry: Sync Pantry Items
  Pantry->>MealMuseApp: Update Available Ingredients
  User->>MealMuseApp: Request Shopping List
  MealMuseApp->>GroceryService: Integrate for Delivery
  GroceryService-->>User: Confirm Delivery
umlDiagrams.component:
flowchart TB
  subgraph Frontend
    app[MealMuse App]
  end
  subgraph Backend
    aiEngine[AI Engine]
    recipeService[Recipe Service]
    mealPlanService[Meal Plan Service]
    pantryService[Pantry Service]
    groceryIntegration[Grocery Integration]
  end
  subgraph Storage
    userDB[User Database]
    recipeDB[Recipe Database]
  end
  subgraph ThirdParty
    groceryService[Grocery Service API]
  end

  app --> mealPlanService
  app --> pantryService
  mealPlanService --> aiEngine
  aiEngine --> recipeService
  recipeService --> recipeDB
  mealPlanService --> groceryIntegration
  pantryService --> recipeService
  groceryIntegration --> groceryService
  mealPlanService --> userDB
  app --> userDB
umlDiagrams.architecture:
architecture-beta
  group frontend(logos:aws-amplify)[Frontend]
    service app(logos:aws-amplify)[MealMuse App] in frontend
  group backend(logos:aws-lambda)[Backend]
    service aiEngine(logos:aws-lambda)[AI Engine] in backend
    service recipeService(logos:aws-lambda)[Recipe Service] in backend
    service mealPlanService(logos:aws-lambda)[Meal Plan Service] in backend
    service pantryService(logos:aws-lambda)[Pantry Service] in backend
    service groceryIntegration(logos:aws-api-gateway)[Grocery Integration] in backend
  group storage(logos:aws-rds)[Storage]
    service userDB(logos:aws-rds)[User Database] in storage
    service recipeDB(logos:aws-dynamodb)[Recipe Database] in storage
  group thirdParty(logos:aws-api-gateway)[Third Party]
    service groceryServiceAPI(logos:aws-api-gateway)[Grocery Service API] in thirdParty

  app:R --> L:mealPlanService
  app:R --> L:pantryService
  mealPlanService:R --> L:aiEngine
  aiEngine:R --> L:recipeService
  recipeService:R --> L:recipeDB
  mealPlanService:R --> L:groceryIntegration
  pantryService:R --> L:recipeService
  groceryIntegration:R --> L:groceryServiceAPI
  mealPlanService:R --> L:userDB
  app:R --> L:userDB
